bioconda.name: bali-phy
bioconda.summary: Phylogenetics - Bayesian estimation of phylogenies and multiple sequence alignments.

biocontainers.name: bali-phy
biocontainers.summary: Markov chain monte carlo software for simultaneous bayesian estimation of alignment and phylogeny (and other parameters). it handles generic bayesian modeling via probabilistic programming.

biotools.summary: Markov chain Monte Carlo software for simultaneous Bayesian estimation of alignment and phylogeny (and other parameters). It handles generic Bayesian modeling via probabilistic programming.

bioschemas.name: BAli-Phy
bioschemas.summary: Markov chain Monte Carlo software for simultaneous Bayesian estimation of alignment and phylogeny (and other parameters). It handles generic Bayesian modeling via probabilistic programming.
